content: Right-click a file, Show more options, Send to, Mail recipient, will open a new TB message with the file attached, if TB is the default mail client.
creator: sfhowes

content: I recall your concern months ago and I filed a bug to have it fixed, and it appears to now be in ver 128, which was released a few days ago.
creator: davidsk

content: Please understand that it is not Thunderbird denying your password. Thunderbird takes changed passwords and submits to the email account as defined by the user and returns the message received. It may be that your email provider requires a different app password for email clients, as does Gmail.
creator: davidsk

content: THunderbird for Iphone has not been released to my knowledge.
creator: davidsk
